name: copilotprompts-m365-act-as-an-excel-tutor-prompt
title: Microsoft 365 Copilot as an Excel tutor
shortDescription: This prompt acts an Excel tutor, generates a sample data table along with excel formula's applied to the generated table to understand basics of Excel.
longDescription: This prompt acts an Excel tutor, generates a sample data table along with excel formula's applied to the generated table to understand basics of Excel.
